database.name: massive
database.description: The Massive Database contains information about all the proteomics/metabolomics datasets in massive

entry.name: Taipale_HSP90_cochaperone_P77_VS3
entry.description: This submission is part of the mass spectrometry datasets for the manuscript by Taipale et al. (HSP90 cochaperone interaction network). This submission contains files for the second batch (2012) of the files included in the manuscript, all acquired on a 5600 TripleTOF mass spectrometer. See the README file within "Methods and Protocols" and the accompanying File description.
